//: Transferred part of the damage and AP specs to the guns.
name: .22 ETC TB
description: .22 Electrothermal-chemical ammunition with subsonic 100gr tungsten ball bullets designed for the Stealth MP. Designed for stopping power and 'silence' first, armor penetration second.

name: .22 ETC HP
description: .22 Electrothermal-chemical ammunition with 33gr hollow point bullets. Higher muzzle velocity than .22 LR and great stopping power for such a small round. It becomes relatively 'silent' when fired from specialized guns.

name: .22 ETC APM
description: .22 Electrothermal-chemical ammunition with 42gr armor-piercing match bullets. Great range and armor penetration for a small handgun round but low stopping power.
//: 15 - 7 dmg transferred to weapons for loudness modifier. 518 m/s muzzle velocity. 365J muzzle energy . Damage reduced by 4.

name: .22 ETC micro-flechette
description: A .22 Electrothermal-chemical cartridge loaded with tiny tungsten flechettes contained within a fragmenting plastic capsule. Short range, very low stopping power but it can hit targets and penetrate armor with greater ease.
